general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetables. For early and maximum yield in cole crops, spray Gibberellic Acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly. In winter, keep doors, windows, and open spaces in cow sheds covered with polythene or gunny bag curtains.

advisory: Post-harvesting stage - Rodent/Rats problem: Locate the rodent burrow and place Aluminium Phosphide tablet. Stored grain insect pest: Fumigate with Aluminium phosphide tablets.
Vegetative stage - Tobacco Caterpillar: Monitor with Pheromone traps. Spray chemical insecticides.
Vegetative stage - Aphids and Thrips: Use neem-based pesticide or chemical spray.
Vegetative stage - Diamond Back Moth: Install light traps. Spray neem-based pesticide.
Planting - Follow specific planting instructions for Dwarf Cavendish and Robusta varieties.
Ensure proper heat provision for chicks. Maintain clean and clamp-free poultry house.
